column4: I have a support issue regarding sound.  Is this a good place to ask?
I have an  HP HDX9000 running Ubuntu 8.10 and EVERYTHING works except sound.  The controls all show sound on but not a peep.  Can anyone assist?
does your mixer show the correct device name?
the mixer shows several device names
does sound work on another distro or operating system?
make sure you're playing through the correct device
Thie: hang on I'll capture the lspci output
There are several "sound cards" on this thing apparently.
What's the name of that site where you cut'npaste stuff so you don't DOS the channel?
thie: there are TWO audio devices
